problem_definition.command_line: fluidity -v3 MMS_A.flml > MMS_A.log; fluidity -v3 MMS_B.flml > MMS_B.log; fluidity -v3 MMS_C.flml > MMS_C.log

variables.variable:
from fluidity_tools import stat_parser as stat from math import log
print("Calculating errors for Velocity in A-B convergence test") a_error_x = stat("MMS_A.stat")["NS"]["VelocityError%1"]["l2norm"][-1] a_error_y = stat("MMS_A.stat")["NS"]["VelocityError%2"]["l2norm"][-1] b_error_x = stat("MMS_B.stat")["NS"]["VelocityError%1"]["l2norm"][-1] b_error_y = stat("MMS_B.stat")["NS"]["VelocityError%2"]["l2norm"][-1]
print(a_error_x) print(a_error_y) print(b_error_x) print(b_error_y)
ab_ratio_x = a_error_x / b_error_x ab_ratio_y = a_error_y / b_error_y ab_convergence_vel = [log(ab_ratio_x, 2), log(ab_ratio_y, 2)]

from fluidity_tools import stat_parser as stat from math import log
print("Calculating errors for Pressure in A-B convergence test") a_error = stat("MMS_A.stat")["NS"]["EddyViscosityError"]["l2norm"][-1] b_error = stat("MMS_B.stat")["NS"]["EddyViscosityError"]["l2norm"][-1]
print(a_error) print(b_error)
ab_ratio = a_error / b_error ab_convergence_ev = log(ab_ratio, 2)

from fluidity_tools import stat_parser as stat from math import log
print("Calculating errors for Velocity in B-C convergence test") b_error_x = stat("MMS_B.stat")["NS"]["VelocityError%1"]["l2norm"][-1] b_error_y = stat("MMS_B.stat")["NS"]["VelocityError%2"]["l2norm"][-1] c_error_x = stat("MMS_C.stat")["NS"]["VelocityError%1"]["l2norm"][-1] c_error_y = stat("MMS_C.stat")["NS"]["VelocityError%2"]["l2norm"][-1]
print(b_error_x) print(b_error_y) print(c_error_x) print(c_error_y)
bc_ratio_x = b_error_x / c_error_x bc_ratio_y = b_error_y / c_error_y bc_convergence_vel = [log(bc_ratio_x, 2), log(bc_ratio_y, 2)]

from fluidity_tools import stat_parser as stat from math import log
print("Calculating errors for Pressure in B-C convergence test") b_error = stat("MMS_B.stat")["NS"]["EddyViscosityError"]["l2norm"][-1] c_error = stat("MMS_C.stat")["NS"]["EddyViscosityError"]["l2norm"][-1]
